title: LF Gold Top, a Jungle, and a ADC/Bottom main for Gold team
body:
Hello All,

Starting a team and If you like to Win and have fun doing it then this is the right team for you. The only requirements are that you are gold (although if you are Silver 1 ill consider) and over the Drinking age (21). 

Please add me IGN: LeftyRaydy or reply here so we can talk more about it.
